ing: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen strawberries, thawed and drained
des: "This is a very nice salad that I serve all the time when I make brunch.  Hope you like it too!"
ins: Mix gelatin and water together.  Stir until dissolved, then add frozen strawberries.  Chill until slightly firm. Fold in nuts and pineapple.  Add whipped topping.  Keep in the fridge until serving.
